settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
1. Shipping is free within India.
2. All orders are dispatched within 2-4 working days. Once the dispatch happens it takes them 2-5 days to deliver at your doorstep.
3. Customized orders may take additional 2-4 days for shipping.
4. In case you need urgent delivery then please Contact us
5. Dispatch and tracking details along with estimated delivery date will be shared with you on your registered mobile number and email id.
6. You can also track your order from “My Account” Section or “Track Order” section.

settings.title: Return & Refund Policy
settings.content:
1. Exchanges and Returns are super easy at Gillori
2. You can initiate return/exchange by clicking here
3. We offer 7 days returns and exchanges.
4. In most of the cases, we arrange reverse pickup from your doorstep. In rarest of rare cases where reverse pickup facility is not available at your PIN code then we’ll inform you and you can ship your return products back to us.
5. Exchanges are completely free of cost.
6. In case of return & refund, we charge nominal amount of Rs.250 per product against reverse shipping charges.
7. Returns will be accepted only if product is unused and tags are intact.
8. For more details, please click here

settings.text_block_2: You get only the best at fair price. We're able to keep quality high and costs low by selling direct to you and avoiding traditional markups.
You get what you see and written on our website. All products pass through 5 stage quality checks before being shipped to you.
Easy returns & exchange, quick refunds, on time deliveries with unmatched customer support, we are always with you.

settings.subtitle: All our products are made by local artisans at Jaipur.
